Expander content description set to null when not used

According to android doc, it seems it should be put to @null to indicate to screen reader it should not be considered.
It's not clear whether null should be a string or how to do it in general.

Accessibility of expander indicated

Ideally, I'd like just to delete the expender when it is not necessary. However, the same expender may be used for
different before and after collapse, so it must keep existing (or be added again, which is hard).
Instead, indicating that it is not required for accessibility, but here only for UI is okay

timeline.bodyText:
Optional: It'd be useful to add an integration test to confirm that if a child is added, the expander is visible.
I believe this is fine currently, as the control is fully refreshed, but this behaviour is subject to change in the future.
timeline.author: david-allison-1

replies.bodyText: Can you please let me know what you mean by "child is added". As far as I understand, there is no notion of "adding" in the deck picker process. Checking whether a collection is displayed properly seems useful. Checking changes does not seems to have sens here as far as I can tell
